1. Maximal_in [armstrng]

Source [armstrng]

definition
let X be set ;
let R be Relation;
defpred S1[ object ] means $1 is_maximal_wrt X,R;
func R Maximal_in X -> Subset of X means :Def1: :: ARMSTRNG:def 1
 for x being object holds
( x in it iff x is_maximal_wrt X,R );
existence uniqueness
end;
